io.cettia.asity.bridge.vertx2

Class AsityRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.cettia.asity.bridge.vertx2.AsityRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler<HttpServerRequest>

    public class AsityRequestHandler
extends Object
implements Handler<HttpServerRequest>
    Handler to process HttpServerRequest into VertxServerHttpExchange. 

     httpServer.requestHandler(new AsityRequestHandler().onhttp(http -> {}));
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim
